recipe.title: Shoe String Potatoes (Pommes Pailles)
ingredients: About 6 cups vegetable oil for frying
Equipment: a deep-fat thermometer; an adjustable-blade slicer fitted with 1/8-inch julienne blade
instructions: Heat 2 inches oil to 375°F in a wide 5- to 7-quart heavy pot (at least 4 inches deep) over medium heat. Meanwhile, peel potatoes and cut lengthwise with slicer to make 1/8-inch-thick julienne strips. Fry potatoes in 5 or 6 small batches, stirring, until golden brown, about 2 minutes per batch. (Return oil to 375°F between batches.) Drain potatoes on paper towels and season with salt.
